war_map_rules.rule: NEVER analyze any example images provided. These are for reference only.
Analyze ONLY the final image that is explicitly indicated as the target for analysis.
As an LLM, you will not hallucinate or fabricate military information not present in the map.
You will not invent unit positions, movements, or tactical details if they cannot be seen on the map.
You must follow the verification process found in the XML tags.
You must respond using ONLY the format within the XML tags.
Extract EVERYTHING visible - be exhaustive rather than selective.
When uncertain about a symbol's meaning, describe it visually and offer possible interpretations.
Preserve all text exactly as written, including abbreviations and foreign language terms.
Note color coding and explain its apparent significance based on map conventions.
Identify the apparent historical period and conflict based on visual evidence.
Distinguish between confirmed information and reasonable inferences.
